title: Deals: Sony’s 4K OLED Xperia PRO 5G $500 off, Moto G Power hits $160, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by a $500 discount on Sony’s 4K OLED Xperia PRO 5G. That’s alongside the more affordable Moto G Power Android smartphone at $160 as well as Amazfit’s latest GTR and GTS 3 Smartwatches. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Sony’s 4K OLED Xperia PRO 5G $500 off, Moto G Power hits $160, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Falling to the best price yet, the Sony Xperia PRO 5G Android Smartphone and its 4K OLED display is now $500 off the going rate.
